text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Wait, isn't that weird?! Scouting an Uma Musume that showed no good points on top of losing?
I was trying to scout Kitasan Black, who had just lost in this mock race. But… the response was laced with doubt.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Umm～, even though I lost? What was it about me that caught your interest?
choice_data_list: …the look in your eyes and your face

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Eeeh? So you're saying my looks? Hmmm, if you were watching closely that makes me happy but, I'd prefer if you focused on my running…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Anyways, I don't think I'm good enough to be scouted just yet. I'm pretty much at the level of an apprentice…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Oh, but training is like your area of expertise, right? In that case, do you think I can get your advice about running? Please!
The contract is on-hold for now but, in the future she'll at least listen to what I have to say.
But… Kitasan Black didn't show up at the scheduled time. She seemed like a sincere girl but, did something happen…?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Eh, Mr. Sumo Wrestler, you twisted your ankle? Even if I lend you my shoulder, you probably won't be able to walk, will you…?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Got it! In that case, I'll take care of it. Don't worry about it, let me carry you myself!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Eeeh, your puppy ran away～?! Is it, possibly, that shepherd running around way over there? Alright, I'll go catch it…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Eeeeh, your truck won't move?! It's fully loaded too… They're emergency supplies?! Then they need to get there quick!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: In that case, I'll carry them! I'll be fine, it's only 20km roundtrip! That much is nothing!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Uuuuuu, I'm sorry～. I was super late… It's just that when I see someone in trouble, I can't just leave them.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I carried a Sumo Wrestler, caught a dog, delivered some emergency supplies… each one by itself wasn't much, but the time it took… I'm sorry～.
She was the epitomy of empathy. Kitasan Black was just that kind of Uma Musume. For now, I won't worry about her being late and advise her.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: How can I get better at racing? Tracen Academy is way different from what I was imagining, and I wasn't prepared at all…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I can't help but think I have to do something about that but, I just really have no idea where to start…
choice_data_list: How about figuring out your strong point?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: My strong point! That's right. I usually just end up leaving it to fighting spirit and don't think about anything else…!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm. In that case… I probably need to understand myself better. To figure out what I can do I need to…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: A strong rival! Yeah! In other words— race against more strong Uma Musume!
And so, we picked some of the strongest Uma Musume and held a mock race.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Kita-chan! Your opponents in today's race are me and… one more that you called, right? That person I admire!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Yeah… I needed to call some of the strongest Uma Musume, so I can figure out what I need to do.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Sorry for making you wait, Kita-san. It sounded like you were trying to figure out your strong points, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Very well, I'll lend you a hand. A 3000m marathon, come at me with everything you can think of.
The mock race against Tracen Academy's strongest stayer "Mejiro McQueen" began.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: (A-amazing… No matter how much she runs, her pace doesn't drop… so this is McQueen-san…!)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: (—?! She's pulling away? I can't… keep up…?! Kuuuu…!)

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: —Right here! Kita-chan, let's go…!!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: (Dia-chan?! She's been marking me this whole time?! No way…!!)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I don't want to lose, I don't want to…!! Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahh!!
In the end, Kitasan Black was utterly defeated.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Kuuu… I'm pathetic… McQueen-san has stamina. And Dia-chan has the technical skill…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I couldn't figure anything out…! If I stay like this, I won't be able to be an Uma Musume that can grant people courage…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Someday becoming someone like that— Even though I want to be just like my dad…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Yes. My dad is an enka singer. His fans and his disciples all really adore him…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Dad isn't just a popular person either. He understands others' pain, and because of that he reaches his hand out to help all kinds of people…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: It's different from singing and racing, but I want to be like that. I want to become the kind of Uma Musume that can give courage and spirit to others…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: But, with the way I am now, unable to find my strength, there's no way I can become like that. Offering people in need my help is about all I can do…
choice_data_list: I think that that's admirable, though

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: But, that's something anyone can do, can't they? I'm just a little bit of a busybody, that's all.
Kitasan Black was feeling down. It's true that in the race this time, her strong legs stood out but-

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: In that case, I'll carry them! I'll be fine, it's only 20km roundtrip! That much is nothing!
I remembered that time when she was late. Repeatedly solving people's troubles one after another. She thinks it's "No big deal" but…
Maybe there's some kind of hidden potential there. I decided to try approaching this from a different angle.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Fuu, really, how troubling… I guess I'll just have to wait for a warmer season, or maybe…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: McQueen, what's wrong? Oh, didn't you race against Kita-chan a little while ago? Is that it?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That case has already been resolved. The thing that's troubling me now is our mountain villa.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The generator seems to be in bade shape. If there wasn't snow, I'd take the replacement one there myself as part of training but…
choice_data_list: Excuse me… do you have a moment?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? You're… that trainer from before. Need something?
choice_data_list: Do you think you can leave it to Kitasan?
Do you think you can leave it to Kitasan?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Eeh? To Kitasan Black-san?! …can I ask why?
